I asked for a cup of hot water because I like to stick my utensils in them to rinse them; I never received it. I will waitress however who was friendly enough and always smiling stayed on her phone more than she tended to my or my aunt's order. I found that behavior to be very rude and very unprofessional and then considering that there was only six customers in the whole diner it still took us about a half an hour before we got service; & lousy service at that."

author: Priyanka Arora
text: 'Never coming back to this place again. Ordered crab cakes.. filled with bread and very little meat and it was not even real crab meat.. it was imitation. Also ordered the egg skillet.. really low quality vegetables used and absolutely tasteless'
